frame.name: Frugality
frame.definition:
<def-root>The words of this frame describe how a <fen>Resource_controller</fen> spends money or other <fen>Resource</fen>s for a particular purpose . They can be applied to the <fen>Resource_controller</fen> or to their <fen>Behavior</fen> in particular instances. These words indicate a judgment of how conservatively the <fen>Resource_controller</fen> guards their <fen>Resource</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Resource_controller">Margeret</fex> has always <m>been</m> <t>penny-wise</t>.</ex> <ex><fex name="Resource_controller">Bill</fex> <t>squanders</t> <fex name="Resource">his money</fex>.</ex> <ex><fex name="Behavior">To spend the surplus now</fex> would <m>be</m> needlessly <t>profligate</t> .</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Resource_controller
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Resource_controller</fen> is the individual whose frugality or generosity is being described. Person typically occurs as the External Argument or, in some cases when <fen>Behavior</fen> is also expressed, in an <ment>of</ment>-PP: <ex><fex name="Resource_controller">Jo</fex> is very <t>frugal</t>.</ex> <ex>It was <t>frugal</t> <fex name="Resource_controller">of Jo</fex> not to pay for dinner.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Behavior
FE.definition: <def-root>Some specific <fen>Behavior</fen> may be described as frugal or extravagant, rather than attributing the characteristic directly to the <fen>Resource_controller</fen>. <ex>It's <t>thrifty</t> of Jo <fex name="Behavior">to re-use teabags</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Resource
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE is the resource which the <fen>Resource_controller</fen> expends. <ex>Pat is <t>wasteful</t> <fex name="Resource">with her time</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Degree</fen> to which a <fen>Resource_controller</fen> is frugal or profligate.</def-root>

FE.name: Judge
FE.definition: <def-root>The individual whose point of view is taken in assigning the judgment denoted by the target.</def-root>
